locations.title: Love's Travel Stop
locations.content: Love's Travel Stop may offer shower facilities. Contact directly to confirm availability and pricing.

showerReviews.reviewText: I went to take a shower, and when I got in, the sink was completely covered in someone else's feces, and the sink was covered in hair. So I went looking for whoever cleaned it to tell them they hadn't, but I couldn't find them. I thought it ‚Ä¶

I went to take a shower and was standing right by the door in shower 5 shaving ü™í then I heard someone opening the door without knocking I came out to ask him is there a problem he said no n I asked why did you try opening my door without ‚Ä¶

‚Ä¶ very careful when reaching for paper towels cause there are big spiders as well, you might become Spiderman. Dirty and old. Also restrooms have no ac and showers also no ac, so either cold shower or sweat while showering.  Small parking lot ‚Ä¶

Pretty decent. I did take a shower while I was there and three out of the four towel hooks were missing. The place where you put your shampoo will not hold a full size bottle of shampoo. If you take anything else in the shower with you, ‚Ä¶
for a shower that is ready. in a moment just do your job. no one is forcing you to do it. if you are fed up just quit work.

‚Ä¶ by a truck stop bathroom - it was cleaner than my home bathroom that is professionally cleaned once a week. The shower was the same. After seven days traveling across the country with my husband from CA to PA, and the fact of how rural ‚Ä¶

There's something seriously wrong if someone can open the door when you're in the shower. If it was the person who cleans the showers, they need to knock first! ...which they didn't even do when I was in the shower. ‚Ä¶

I found fecal (poop) streaks going across a wash cloth in the shower room. That means they don‚Äôt wash the towels very well because they‚Äôre in a hurry. I feel bad for all my fellow truckers who had to use towels washed in the same batch as ‚Ä¶
Shower emty but they not clean long time wait 50 minutes people free

Truck drivers, let this be your last choice to stop for anything. Fuel, food, shower etc. An average Love's at best. Usually not too clean. Very spacious parking but good luck finding one if you get there after 3 pm. Fuel islands are almost ‚Ä¶

showerReviews.reviewText: Always good for a place to park, a shower, some food and drinks and just about anything you could want even slot machines and other forms of video gambling.
They got it all even a shower!!!! Love dis place

got fuel for $480.00 and try to get shower me and my wife and they told me we can not take shower in the same shower room we need to use separate rooms and one shower room is clean and the other one needs to be clean in next 1 hour ...(at ‚Ä¶

The hallway back to the bathroom/ shower area smells absolutely awful. It's constantly like this too! Almost the smell of sewer or something.
Please do something about this, it's almost causing me to stop coming here.
Disgusting shower and I have been puking up Burger King for 20 minutes now

locations.title: TA Travel Center
locations.content: TA Travel Center may offer shower facilities. Contact directly to confirm availability and pricing.

showerReviews.reviewText: Very nice lounge and shower area! Nice big parking lot as well. I got there late at night and there were still a few spots left. Lot of restaurants in the area and appears to be a nice area. Home Depot, Olive Garden, Walmart, etc all fairly ‚Ä¶

Great place to grab a shower if you're road tripping, camping, or showing at the fair center. Showers are $17, time capped at 90mins, towels provided; they don't regulate how many people share the shower, which was a great deal for my ‚Ä¶
the guy working at night was really helpful. my account was locked but he understood the issue and offered me a free shower. The customer service was excellent.

Showers are great thank you for the great water pressure and hot shower. But today I didn't get the lady's name at the register she was rude maybe she was having a bad day i totally get it but a smile and good customer service goes along ‚Ä¶

I bought a shower and this is what I paid for. Hair in the sink dust around the fan. It doesn't smell like someone cleaned it just wiped everything down with water. I'd hate to spend 30k a year for someone to clean and get these results. Ma ‚Ä¶

‚Ä¶ Stopped here to take a shower. Worst shower I ever had. Told the guy that cleans them to quit his job because this amounts to cruel treatment of employees! It's 105 degrees outside. The shower room itself probably 2 degrees less. No ‚Ä¶

‚Ä¶ . Truckers will find parking here late at night. Beware of the craters at the truck entrance. You won't enjoy your shower here much. Freezing cold, old shower room with no pressure from the shower head. They do try to keep it clean though. ‚Ä¶

‚Ä¶ was super nice and the ladys working in the country pride where super nice! Other than that i waited 30 mins for a shower cause the giy cleaning them was mia the down stairs mens room was awful looked like it had been awhile since it had ‚Ä¶

Shower pressure is a joke here we‚Äôll from my experience in shower #1 it was a literal trickle.
Needs an update.

Please turn the air on upstairs. I was sweating so bad doing my laundry I almost passed out. Even after taking a shower I still felt gross as right after I got out I started sweating immediately. It was at least 90 degrees upstairs.

showerReviews.reviewText: ‚Ä¶ of travel medications, drinks/snacks (including local wine!), and firewood. The bathrooms were spacious (family friendly) with a travelers shower, and quality toilet paper!! I just stopped for a bathroom break, so I didn‚Äôt use the shower, ‚Ä¶

‚Ä¶ ! Truly a gem of a place. Plenty of space for truckers and rvers. Good gas price. Extremely friendly  staff. Restrooms very clean and fitted with shower as well. By the time I remembered to take pictures, we were half way through eating!

There are few regular gas machines ‚õΩ. Most of them are for truck's deisel engines. Gas price is more expensive than others, but not the most one nearby. You might take a shower at the store and continue your trip.

‚Ä¶ for overnight staying but you can go park on the park and ride parking right in front. Very good breakfast sandwich in the grab‚Äôn‚Äôgo display, I think they are doing some on demand lunch but not for the breakfast. I think they have shower..

Good place to park, nice showers and pretty good premade sandwiches, deli type. They have a restaurant type thing in there but not sure what the deal is with it. It wasn't open at 14:00 in any case or when I went back in to shower later on. ‚Ä¶

Went in to take a shower. 10 bucks..not that unusual but the older lady with blackish hair behind the counter was rude. Seemed irritated I was in there asking for a shower..i can spend my money else where. When leaving she kind of barked at ‚Ä¶

‚Ä¶ with messed up facilities etc. BUT now it has a brand new facility country style  building all new in every way, showers, breakfast and eat in with tables, etc, very clean inside, new pumps and paved parking. It doesn't have a huge amount ‚Ä¶
Look like a good place to stop by. There is shower there too. Cool! Good place but not many spots for trucks.

Today is thanksgiving 11/25/21 I came here to put fuel I met a guy his name is zackh I told him I need 500$ diesel after finishing the fuel I asked him I need to take a shower,how much the shower is ? He said 10$ but free for you and I said ‚Ä¶

If you are looking for ethanol free gas, or a trucker needing a clean shower this place rocks.  But  the Button burger joint is very expensive and service is slow.  We waited 10 minutes before someone came out to wait on the customer in ‚Ä¶

showerReviews.reviewText: ‚Ä¶ office where Dwight and Jim had to stay here and recharge and relax , so many amazing amenities , good food , CLEAN RESTROOMS AND SHOWERS !!!!! Oh my god how amazing it felt to shower after 2 days on the road , the young man working at ‚Ä¶

‚Ä¶ I recommend) or use coins. For whatever reason, the dryers don't allow cards, only the washers do. Shower was clean for the most part, but the sink could use more attention (there was beard hair everywhere). The shower is small, as well ‚Ä¶

‚Ä¶ lady making sandwiches and not bad for truck stop prices like $12 foot sub but it was huge and like double meat at subway. Large parking lot and good shower. I try to stay away from these parts but if I‚Äôm in the area this will be my stop

While I was under the shower the water turned cold suddenly. Didn't like it even though it was supposed to be healthy. There was piss on the bowl and hair in the sink. The food at the fuel island was dried out and It was 7:00 pm. Probably ‚Ä¶
Food was good service was good shower was cool very little hot water

‚Ä¶ truck drivers talking about how one of them wished he kept selling dope instead of trucking. The restaurant is full of disgusting people, I could skip a week for a shower and still represent myself better. The place needs an overhaul quick.

Showers are clean, include 2 large towels, 2 wash cloths, hand towel and floor towel. Also 2 bars of soap, and a plastic cup for water (and a mint üëåüèª). They have an iron skillet (I‚Äôm posting this 4/13 during COVID and theyre taking orders ‚Ä¶
Shower fans needed cleaned. The laundry room was a disaster. Was told they don't clean it. It's the laundry peoples job? REALLY? It's in your building. I use to like this truck stop. Not so much now.

Friendly staff,plenty of parking. The shower room had a dirty unswept floor, & ordered a well done buger that had to be sent back because it was still pink in the middle. Overall it is a GOOD truck stop even with those 2 things not right, ‚Ä¶

The shower that I had was clean but the sink water PSI isnt very strong and the water didnt get hot, kinda barely warm. The shower itself was ok. The buffet was a disappointment but again, ok. My waitress was attentive and cute. ‚Ä¶
